title: [Question] Anti ragging undertaking
content: In the girls hostel admission form in rr campus, there is a pg for the anti ragging undertaking which says it needs to be typed on 50 rs stamp paper with notary and advocate seal and signature. Seniors based in bangalore where did yall get this done??

comments.body: Nowhere, so that ragging becomes legal when you don't submit the form /s

There would be E-stamp notary shops in the city , check near your house.  
They usually have sign boards for doing voter id , pan card , rental agreement etc.  
you can take the stamp paper print from them and take a sign from an advocate if u know any , otherwise these shops also have an advocate you can ask them.
